dct_title_s: Major Rivers Line Portland Metro, Oregon 2001
dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents major rivers for Portland Metro, Oregon in 2001. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center February 2001.[Major rivers and water bodies derived from Metro's Riv_poly data layer. Includes: the Columbia, Willamette, Sandy, Clackamas and Lewis Rivers; Lake Oswego; Smith, Bybee, Vancouver and Sturgeon Lakes.]
